questions.title: 我一到达目的地就打电话给你。
questions.answer: I'll call you as soon as I arrive at my destination.

questions.title: 我们计划雨一停就去野餐。
questions.answer: We plan to have a picnic as soon as it stops raining.

questions.title: 我丈夫一走出机场就给了我一个大大的拥抱。
questions.answer: My husband gave me a big hug as soon as he walked out of the airport.

questions.title: 那位柔弱的女士刚到目的地就病倒了。
questions.answer: That emasculate lady fell ill as soon as she arrived at her destination.

questions.title: 卡洛儿一结束自己的本职工作就去帮助其他人了。
questions.answer: Carol helped others as soon as she finished her own job.

title: ——请耐心等待，我们需要一个好的时机。
——他们一结束就会告诉你详细情况。

answer.en: Please wait patiently. We need a good chance.
They will give you the details as soon as they finish it.

title: ——我一吃完一个苹果你就给我另外一个。你是想让我吃撑吗？
——这就是我的目的。

answer.en: You give me another one as soon as I ate up one apple. Do you want me tobe stuffed?

title: ——你的儿子一看完电视节目就玩电脑。
——他从不听我的话，我没有办法教育他。

answer.en: Your son goes to play computer as soon as he turns off the TV.
He never listens to me. I can't teach him.
